DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study help answer follow research question : Whether switch duloxetine improves depress mood current treatment work well patient depression .
DOC.criteria: Male female outpatient age 18 year old meet criterion Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) . Currently receive selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) serotoninnorepinephrine reuptake inhibitor ( SNRI ) class antidepressant least month treatment depression . Females childbearing potential ( surgically sterilize menarche 1 year postmenopause ) test negative pregnancy base urine pregnancy test agree use reliable method birth control . Women pregnant plan pregnant breastfeeding . To receive treatment within last 30 day drug receive regulatory approval indication . Diagnosed treatment resistant depression . History bipolar disorder , schizophrenia , psychotic disorder . To previously take duloxetine n't work . Judged serious suicidal risk opinion investigator and/or score > =3 Item 3 ( suicide ) 17Item Hamilton Depression Rating Scale ( HAMD17 ) screening ( Visit 1 ) baseline ( Visit 2 ) . A serious medical illness may need treatment study . Taking certain medication allow study . To history alcohol and/or drug abuse dependence within past year . To uncontrolled narrowangle glaucoma . To allergic reaction many medicine . To undergo `` shock '' therapy ( Electroconvulsive Therapy ) `` magnet '' treatment ( Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ) within past year . To initiate `` talk therapy '' ( psychotherapy ) study . To chronic pain take medicine last 6 month . To certain liver disease . To kidney disease undergoing dialysis . Abnormal thyroid stimulate hormone ( TSH ) concentration .
